p: Answer: The combinations 4 and 5 both have the same negative and positive ionization modes, the same m / z, and the same ionization pattern, they must be isomers. It is reqired standard combinations to identify them, but we have no way to obtain them, so, in article it was revised into “Aspenin-6-C-Arabinose-8-C-glucoside or Chrysin- 6-C- glucose - 8 - C - Araboside”.
